name: ax-c7
comment: Axiom of Quantified Negation. This axiom is used to manipulate negated quantifiers. Equivalent to axiom scheme C7' in [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of the preprint). An alternate axiomatization could use ~ axc5c711 in place of ~ ax-c5 , ~ ax-c7 , and ~ ax-11 . This axiom is obsolete and should no longer be used. It is proved above as theorem ~ axc7 . (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-1993.) (New usage is discouraged.)
